entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Updates on the Covid-19 situation in South Korea
Coronavirus: Human trials for experimental vaccine begin in the US
entity.description:
Pharmaceutical companies Pfizer and BioNTech confirmed the start of human trials for a potential coronavirus vaccine. If successful, the vaccine could be in "emergency use" starting in September, officials say.

📝 Lists: Accounts to follow

text:
All we have to do is more than 3 things.
-Keep wearing mask when we go outdoors 
-Don’t be close to each other too often, and stay home at least more than 3 days if you feel sick.
-And wash your hands & use hand sanitizers for yourself and others. #Korea #CoronaVirus #COVID19
